name: HellFurnace
description:
Having encountered a god, you must protect this world from demons.
Enter the demons' lair and wipe out the demons before they damage the world!

If you dodge the enemy's attacks, you can acquire orbs that can be used to craft weapons.
When two orbs are acquired, a weapon is created.
Depending on which orb you have acquired, the weapons you can use will vary.
You can use your weapon to damage enemies.
It is a boss rush game where you clear the game by defeating the bosses you encounter.

features

  • 2D side view game
  • Boss rush
  • Avoid enemy attacks
  • Attack by combining marbles
